metadata.Title: CVE-2017-14718 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium.
metadata.Description:
Before version 4.8.2, WordPress was susceptible to a Cross-Site Scripting attack in the link modal via a javascript: or data: URL.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-14718` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

wordpress - 4.8.2+dfsg-1
wordpress-l10n - 4.8.2+dfsg-1
wordpress-theme-twentyfifteen - 4.8.2+dfsg-1
wordpress-theme-twentyseventeen - 4.8.2+dfsg-1
wordpress-theme-twentysixteen - 4.8.2+dfsg-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: wordpress package in bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '4.8.2+dfsg-1').
